title: TGSP LoRA Configuration
description: JSON Schema for the LoRA configuration block within a TGSP manifest.

rank.description: LoRA rank (r). Controls the dimensionality of the low-rank decomposition.

alpha.description: LoRA scaling factor (alpha). The effective scaling is alpha/rank.

target_modules.description: List of module names in the base model to apply LoRA adaptation to (e.g. 'q_proj', 'v_proj', 'gate').

lora_dropout.description: Dropout probability applied to LoRA layers during training.

bias.description: Bias handling strategy. 'none' = no bias, 'all' = train all biases, 'lora_only' = only LoRA biases.

task_type.description: PEFT task type that determines the model head and loss function.

simd_slots.description: Number of SIMD slots for FHE (Fully Homomorphic Encryption) operations.

cols_per_ct.description: Number of matrix columns packed per ciphertext in FHE encoding.

batches.description: Number of FHE batches for parallel encrypted inference.
